pageTitle: Three Floor Flare Neoprene Dress | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Guide: 6=XXS, 8=XS, 10=S, 12=M, 14=L Three Floor pieces run small. Please size up. UK sizes. Sizes listed are Size & Fit Length: 31in / 79cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Hand wash. 90% polyester/10% spandex. Fabric: Soft mid-weight jersey. Slinky mid-weight jersey imitates neoprene on this structured Three Floor dress, lending a soft weight to the breezy silhouette. The double-V neckline dips low in the back for a sexy peek of skin, and the ruffled hem keeps the look fun and feminine. Unlined. Size & Fit tab. NOTE: Sizes listed are UK. Please see Description Three Floor > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Named a "brand to watch" by Vogue, Three Floor clothing blends luxe fabrics with a vibrant, playful aesthetic. Under the direction of its creative director, Central Saint Martins graduate Han Chong, the London-based label has seen unprecedented success since its launch in 2011. Three Floor harmonizes edge and femininity, creating effortless silhouettes for the modern, fashion-forward woman. See all Three Floor reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
